summary: AN ORDINANCE related to land use and zoning, amending Sections 11.16.240, 15.16.040, 22.206.160, 23.41.018, 23.44.012, 23.45.510, 23.47A.012, 23.47A.013, 23.57.012, 23.84A.024, 23.84A.032, and 23.86.006 of the Seattle Municipal Code to make clarifications, and correct cross-references, formatting, errors, and omissions from Ordinance 123495.
note: This Council Bill was replaced by Ordinance [123564](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=123564&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=1&f=G), passed by the Full Council on March 21, 2011, and will be retired.
